message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a valuable product that I believe will be of great use to you.  I'm offering it to you for $9500.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. However, I'm looking to spend no more than $8000 on this product. Would you consider selling it to me for $8000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $8000 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down a little more to $8500.  Let me know if you'd be open to that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8000 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to go down to $8250 as a final compromise. This is a great product, and you won't find this price anywhere else. Let me know what you think.

Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but I have a firm offer from another seller for $8000. I can only go as high as $8000. Please let me know if you can match this price, as I'd prefer to purchase from you.
